creator: BAU YAZILIM
descriptionHtml:
When you want to send a message from your phone's sms application, you are stuck to the limit of 20 people. Thanks to this application, you will be able to send your chosen contacts in groups of 20 individually.

So why do you choose one by one in the form of a group of 20? Let us explain.
Reason: GOOGLE PLAY WANT TO SEND MESSAGE THROUGH MESSAGES APPLICATION.

Due to the new rules of Google Play, the process of sending bulk sms with an automatic button on the program was restricted. For this reason, you will be able to click and send the contacts you select through the application in groups of 20. It is a little difficult but this is the easiest! :)

Google has now blocked automated messaging from Android apps. For this reason, when you select people, we have created split buttons with 20 parts above for you.

WHAT YOU SHOULD DO

1 - Write your message and click on the first button of the buttons that will appear after selecting the people you want to send a message to
2 - Button will direct you to your sms application
3 - Press the send button in the SMS application.
4 - come back to this application
5 - Click on the button that we have reserved for you and continue again.

Bayram Ali ÜNÜVAR
I bilgi@bauyazilim.co

You can send an e-mail to info@bauyazilim.com for your requests, suggestions and any complaints.


Sentences for availability:
If you want to send a bulk message or send a bulk sms, in other words, you can send bulk esemes.
You can choose when you send oil lamp message, holiday message and Friday message.

You can either send a message piece by piece or send a message by selecting one from the directory.

Program; Also known as sending unlimited bulk messages, it is also known as sending unlimited bulk sms. Others may define it as sending unlimited bulk items.
descriptionShort: Select contacts from your directory, send your messages easily.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: English language support has been added.

title: Bulk Sms Sending - Conforms to New Android Rules

creator: BAU YAZILIM
descriptionHtml:
Attention!
In some phones, you can first make the phone send as SMS, not mms, by selecting the settings> advanced> group messages setting of the phone's own message application, "Send sms to all recipients and receive replies one by one".

When you want to send a message from your phone's sms application, you are stuck in the limit of 20 people. Thanks to this application, you will be able to send the people you choose one by one in groups of 20.

So why do you send them individually in groups of 20? Let's explain.
Reason: GOOGLE PLAY ASTS TO SEND A MESSAGE THROUGH THE MESSAGES APP.

In accordance with the new Google Play rules, sending bulk sms with an automatic button on the program was restricted. For this reason, you will be able to click and send the people you choose on the application in groups of 20. It's a little difficult, but it's the easiest! :)

Google has now blocked the automatic sending of messages from Android apps. For this reason, when you choose the people, we have created 20 divided buttons for you above.

WHAT YOU MUST DO

1 - Write your message and click the first button from the buttons that will appear after selecting the people you want to send a message to.
2 - Button will direct you to your sms application
3 - Click the send button in the Sms application.
4 - Come back to this application
5 - Continue by clicking on the 2nd button we reserved for you and repeat the same process.

Bayram Ali ÜNÜVAR
bilgi@bauyazilim.com

You can send an e-mail to bilgi@bauyazilim.com address for your requests, suggestions and complaints, if any.



Whether you want to send a message piece by piece, you can send a message by selecting from the phone book one by one.

Phrases for availability:
If you want to send mass messages on special days, our application is for you. You can no longer send messages in bulk with a single click. To prevent this, we have created message sending buttons divided into 20 equal parts in the application. By pressing these buttons, you will be able to easily send sms on Fridays. Of course, you can choose our bulk sms application at night and lamps. You can send as many messages as your defined sms package to your line. There are no restrictions. If you say "I cannot send a message", you can try sending it from our bulk sms application. By grouping the contacts you have selected in the application, you can easily select the group in your next message sending process and send sms more easily and quickly.
descriptionShort: Error-free bulk messaging app, try it and you will see the difference.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We regularly update our app to make it better for you.

- Some fixes and performance improvements were made in line with your requests and suggestions.

Thank you for using our bulk SMS sending application.
You can let us know whether you like this latest version or not by commenting and liking on the store or sending us an e-mail at this mail address: bilgi@bauyazilim.com

Thanks for using.

Reason: GOOGLE PLAY ASTS TO SEND A MESSAGE THROUGH THE MESSAGES APP.
